info.description:
Contemporary Style
A minimalist design for the ultimate pared down look. Perfect for everyday use as well as throwing stylish dinner parties.

Made for You
Built from engineered wood with an easy-to-use aluminium mechanism. Slicked in ultra sleek grey lacquer for a high gloss finish.

Choose Your Size
The extension leaves are cleverly designed to be stored underneath the table. It can be extended to two different sizes to suit you.

whybuy.Contemporary Style: A minimalist design for the ultimate pared down look. Perfect for everyday use as well as throwing stylish dinner parties.

whybuy.Made for You: Built from engineered wood with an easy-to-use aluminium mechanism. Slicked in ultra sleek grey lacquer for a high gloss finish.

whybuy.Choose Your Size: The extension leaves are cleverly designed to be stored underneath the table. It can be extended to two different sizes to suit you.

Product Details.Materials: Engineered wood top and legs; aluminium slide

Product Details.Special features: Extending design. Flip the catches to release, pull leg section to extend and lift out the leaves from within, lock catches to secure. 2 extension leaves - 2 extended lengths

Product Dimensions.General Dimensions: 3 lengths - 174, 219 or 264cm x W90 x H76cm

info.name: Bramante Extending Dining Table in grey
